channel.title: Changing item bonuses
channel.description:
well, i figured itd be easy so ive been taking breaks looking for it for about 3 hours (not straight thru) and havent been able to figure it out.
so how do you change the bonuses an item gives you? what do i need to look in.
also, how the hell do you ban an ip? i copy and paste the connectedfrom info into bannedips. but they still log in? :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2008, 06:31:59 AM[/size][hr]C'mon, i know someone knows.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2008, 08:04:35 AM[/size][hr]please help? :s
